title: Episode 70: Erin Patinkin and Agatha Kulaga
description:
This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy Erway invites Erin Patinkin and Agatha Kulaga of Ovenly NYC. These makers of delicious baked goods and bar snacks such as black chocolate stout cake share their insight about how start and maintain a small craft business as well as how to make a good scrapple. This episode was sponsored by
Cain Vineyard and Winery.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
